es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica5.views

Class GenericSwingView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica5.views.GenericSwingView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObserver, AutomaticMoves.AutoMovesListener, BoardGUI.BoardGUIListener, PieceColors.PieceColorsListener, PlayerModes.PlayerModesListener, QuitPanel.QuitPanelListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdvancedTTTSwingView, AtaxxSwingView, ConnectNSwingView

    public abstract class GenericSwingView
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements PieceColors.PieceColorsListener, BoardGUI.BoardGUIListener, AutomaticMoves.AutoMovesListener, QuitPanel.QuitPanelListener, PlayerModes.PlayerModesListener, GameObserver
    Abstract class implementing a game observer that outputs all the events in the game in a graphic window.

    Clase abstracta que implementa un observador de juegos que muestra todos los eventos del juego en una ventana grafica.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GenericSwingView

        public GenericSwingView(Observable<GameObserver> g,
                        Controller controller,
                        Piece viewPiece,
                        Player randomPlayer,
                        Player aiPlayer)
        Construct a generic view for playing game, with a piece associated to the view.

        Construye una vista generica para jugar al juego game con una pieza asociada a la vista.

        Parameters:
        g - Observer of the view.

        Observador de la vista.

        controller - Controller of the view.

        Controlador de la vista.

        viewPiece - The piece to which this view belongs (null means that it belongs to all pieces).

        La ficha a la que pertenece la vista (null si la vista pertenece a todos los jugadores).

        randomPlayer - The player to be used for generating random moves, if null the view should not support random player.

        El jugador que se va a utilizar para generar movimientos aleatorios. Si es null, la vista no permite jugadores aleatorios.

        aiPlayer - The player to be used for generating automatics moves, if null the view should not support AI (automatic) player.

        El jugador que se va a utilizar para generar movimientos automaticos. Si es null, la vista no permite jugadores IA (automaticos).

    • Method Detail

      • onGameStart

        public void onGameStart(Board board,
                        java.lang.String gameDesc,
                        java.util.List<Piece> pieces,
                        Piece turn)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that a game has started.

        Notifica que se ha iniciado un juego.

        Specified by:
        onGameStart in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        gameDesc - A string describing the currently played game.

        Un string que describe el juego al que se esta jugando.

        pieces - A list of pieces that are used to play the game (each piece belongs to a player).

        Lista de fichas que se utilizan para jugar a este juego (cada ficha pertenece a un jugador).

        turn - The piece to be played next.

        Ficha a la que corresponde mover.

      • onGameOver

        public void onGameOver(Board board,
                       Game.State state,
                       Piece winner)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that a game has finished (with a winner, draw, or stopped).

        Notifica que ha terminado un juego (con un ganador, en tablas, o se ha interrumpido).

        Specified by:
        onGameOver in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        state - The state in which the game has finished.

        Estado en el que ha quedado el tablero.

        winner - The piece of the winner, if the game has finished with a winner, otherwise null.

        Ficha del ganador si el juego ha terminado con un ganador, o null en caso contrario.

        public void onMoveStart(Board board,
                        Piece turn)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that a move is about to start executing.

        Notifica que va a iniciarse un movimiento.

        Specified by:
        onMoveStart in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        turn - The piece to be played next (by the move).

        Ficha a la que corresponde mover a continuacion.

      • onMoveEnd

        public void onMoveEnd(Board board,
                      Piece turn,
                      boolean success)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that the execution of a move has finished.

        Notifica que ha terminado la realización de un movimiento.

        Specified by:
        onMoveEnd in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        turn - The piece that was supposed to be played by the move.

        Ficha a la que correspondia mover en el movimiento que acaba de terminar.

        success - true if the move has been executed successfully, otherwise false.

        true si el movimiento se ha realizado correctamente, false en caso contrario.
